channel.title: DeadlyPkers - We Deliver The Best
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i291.photobucket.com/albums/ll314/zeshan_2005/BannerforDPK-1.gif[/img]
[url=http://www.deadlypkers.net/forum/index.php]Forums[/url] | [url=http://www.dpkclient.net]WebClient[/url] | [url=http://www.dpkers.net/]Client Download[/url]
[b]Why play Deadlypkers?[/b] Server has been Online for almost 2years. The server can handle a good amount of players without any lag if any lag is found we always make sure we find the issue and try to fix it ASAP. We're also a server which tries its best to get the server working without any bugs, The staff team is always there to help players, We also have players who are titled 'Helpers' which always backup the staff and help them with helping other players, these players are experienced players who know most of the game so they're there to help you at any time, All skills work we're currently working on the skill summoning which hopefully will be released soon to the public, The combat is rewritten and we're hoping for PKers & Hybrids to come on our server to try it out so we can have feedback on the server's combat and fix it to make it suitable for all players, Switching is amazing and is worked on every time an issue happens with it, We try our best to keep the server stable & all the players happy.
[b]Please note: We do not promise that everything is bug-free, we aren't going to lie to you and tell you that our features are 100%, There will be bugs although we do guarantee you that they will be fixed when reported and found. [/b]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/sl6x5t.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/34641s5.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2952weu.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/24guob9.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: DeadlyPkers - We Deliver The Best
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

[quote=“Pk3r Fr34k, post:11, topic:462637”][quote author=Int Bauk link=topic=565823.msg4120276#msg4120276 date=1349631677]

nice, you payed sigex to do it all for you.

^^ You have no idea what you are talking about. Sigex only did a few stuff client sided…

I used to play this till the player base dropped by 75%

Good Luck, Jack.

well obviously i do since i knew sigex was involved, and as far as i can see, all it is is client…
[/quote]

It’s more than that…trust me on this one its one of the finest out there. Summon, EP loots this server is one of a kind.[/quote]

exactly. all client sided.

Read full topic

@TimeTM wrote:

[center]

Forums | WebClient | Client Download

Why play Deadlypkers?
Server has been Online for almost 2years. The server can handle a good amount of players without any lag if any lag is found we always make sure we find the issue and try to fix it ASAP. We’re also a server which tries its best to get the server working without any bugs, The staff team is always there to help players, We also have players who are titled ‘Helpers’ which always backup the staff and help them with helping other players, these players are experienced players who know most of the game so they’re there to help you at any time, All skills work we’re currently working on the skill summoning which hopefully will be released soon to the public, The combat is rewritten and we’re hoping for PKers & Hybrids to come on our server to try it out so we can have feedback on the server’s combat and fix it to make it suitable for all players, Switching is amazing and is worked on every time an issue happens with it, We try our best to keep the server stable & all the players happy.

Please note: We do not promise that everything is bug-free, we aren’t going to lie to you and tell you that our features are 100%, There will be bugs although we do guarantee you that they will be fixed when reported and found.
